article_title: Arkansas Blue Cross & Blue Shield's Reimbursement Rates Raise Concerns From Specialists
article_text: Starting Jan. 1, ABCBS will pay physician specialists 15 percent less for the same procedures done by non-specialists, such as family practice doctors, for patients who bought policies through the new health insurance exchange, she said. The new fees won't apply to the carrier's current commercial policies or group plans.

article_metadata.keywords: Little Rock, Business Journal, Business news

The new fees won't apply to the carrier's current commercial policies or group plans.
Starting Jan. 1, ABCBS will pay physician specialists 15 percent less for the same procedures done by non-specialists, such as family practice doctors, for patients who bought policies through the new health insurance exchange, she said.
